sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含有"小心的，谨慎的"之意。
means: careful ： 侧重做事谨慎、留心，特别注意一些细节地方。
cautious ： 着重考虑事情的后果，谨慎留意，防止出差错。
attentive ： 指认真地注意地倾听别人的意见，留心别人的需要等。
prudent ： 指遇事审慎，思考计划周密，不贸然行事。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"关心的，体贴的"之意。
means: considerate ： 指能设身处地为别人着想，给予同情或谅解。
thoughtful ： 指为他人着想，主动关怀，做有益于他人的事。
attentive ： 指对人关怀备至，热情周到，这可能出于真诚，也可能出于私利。

sentence.Network_en: The vast majority of the attentive audience applauded these sentiments.
sentence.Network_cn: 大多数聚精会神听讲的观众都对这些观点表示赞赏。

sentence.Network_en: The hotel staff are friendly and attentive.
sentence.Network_cn: 旅馆人员友好而且照顾周到。

sentence.Network_en: She was very attentive to her guests.
sentence.Network_cn: 她对客人招待得十分周到.

PerfectNetExp.abs: (A-B)英语四级词汇表下载 ... attention n. 注意，留心；注意力 attentive a. 注意的；有礼貌的 attitude n. 态度，看法；姿势.
细字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 细屑〖 particle〗 细心〖 careful;attentive〗 细伢子〖 child〗.
高级中学三年级英文单字题库_馆档网 ... "attention" 注意" "attentive" 殷勤的" "attitude" 态度&quot.
职称英语考试常用词汇表（A-B） ... +attendant 2．出席人，参加人 +attentive 注意的，留心的 +attorney 2．律师，代理人.

list.abs: 选择性注意（selective attention）是指在外界诸多刺激中仅仅注意到某些刺激或刺激的某些方面，而忽略了其他刺激。编辑本段作用  …
注意广度如图所示，横坐标6上的红线代表着人类平均注意广度（attention span）。我们注意到在5.5的位置上函数曲线几乎是看不见 …
在注意力经济(attention economy)的时代，面对每天数百万计的信息更新量以及数十亿计的网络页面“轰炸”着我们这个时代，我们应该 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from Old French attentif, -ive, from atendre 'give one's attention to' (see attend)

entry.def: If you are attentive, you are paying close attention to what is being said or done.

example.ex: The vast majority of the attentive audience applauded these sentiments...
example.tran: 大多数聚精会神听讲的观众都对这些观点表示赞赏。

example.ex: He wishes the government would be more attentive to detail in their response.
example.tran: 他希望政府的回应能更加关注细节。

entry.def: Someone who is attentive is helpful and polite.

example.ex: At society parties he is attentive to his wife...
example.tran: 在社交聚会上，他对妻子体贴周到。

example.ex: The staff is well trained in courteous and attentive service to each and every guest.
example.tran: 员工训练有素，为每一位客人提供礼貌周到的服务。

means.word_mean: 1. (often followed by `to') giving care or attention;

sentences.sentence: "the nurse was attentive to her patient"

means.word_mean: 2. taking heed; giving close and thoughtful attention;

auth_sentence.content: The ear is particularly attentive to the human voice.
auth_sentence.res_content: The ear is particularly attentive to the human voice.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The ear is particularly attentive to the human voice.

auth_sentence.content: He'd always been alert and attentive to Hadley.
auth_sentence.res_content: He'd always been alert and attentive to Hadley.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He'd always been alert and attentive to Hadley.

auth_sentence.content: They are affectionate, attentive and very intelligent.
auth_sentence.res_content: They are affectionate, attentive and very intelligent.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They are affectionate, attentive and very intelligent.

stems_affixes.word_buile: at加强+tent伸展,趋向+ive……的→伸展出去的→注意的,有礼貌的
intention[n.意图,意向,目的]+al表形容词→adj.有意图的, 故意的
pre前+tent伸展,趋向+ious……的→提前摆出一种姿态→做作的
attentive[adj.注意的;有礼貌的]+ly表副词→adv.注意地, 留意地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 注意,注意力;立正;特别照顾;照料
stems_affixes.word_buile: at加强+tent伸展,趋向+ion表名词→伸展出去→注意;照料

stems_affixes.value_cn: 广度,宽度,长度;程度,限度
stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出+tent伸展,趋向→伸出去的范围→广度,宽度
intent[adj.目不转睛的,热切的 n.意图]+ion表名词→n.意图,意向,目的
tent伸展,趋向→伸展开用来遮雨,阳光等→帐篷

Sentence.sentence: In the next couple of years the businesses that thrive will be those that are tight with costs, careful of debt, cautious with cash flow and extremely attentive to what customers want.

means.word_mean: 对某人〔物〕 注意的;专心的,留心的;警惕的

sentences.en: The speaker likes to have an attentive audience.
sentences.cn: 演讲者喜欢注意力集中的听众。

sentences.en: She was very attentive to her guests.
sentences.cn: 她对客人招待得十分周到。
